lead_paragraph: Olympique Lyonnais will wait until the last minute to decide if keeper Anthony Lopes is fit to play in Wednesday's Champions League decider against Sevilla after firecrackers were thrown at him during a Ligue 1 game, coach Bruno Genesio said.

headline.print_headline: Lyon's Lopes Faces Fitness Test After Firecracker Incident
headline.main: Lyon's Lopes Faces Fitness Test After Firecracker Incident

snippet: Olympique Lyonnais will wait until the last minute to decide if keeper Anthony Lopes is fit to play in Wednesday's Champions League decider against Sevilla after firecrackers were thrown at him during a Ligue 1 game, coach Bruno Genesio said....
